item.title: EP 910 - The Screaming Wraith Of Nettleton High
item.itunes:title: The Screaming Wraith Of Nettleton High
item.description:
Today we find out getting skinned alive can get you a snazzy song, and then we travel to Nettleton High School to try to solve the ghastly mystery of Raider Gym!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Amazon Wish List

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

https://www.scarystudies.com/skinned-tom-urban-legend/

THE URBAN LEGEND OF SKINNED TOM

https://puzzleboxhorror.com/the-urban-legend-of-skinned-tom/

https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/new-hampshire-man-guilty-murder-killing-beheading-wifes-coworker-rcna30797

The Ghost of Raider Gym

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s80KZk286-I&ab_channel=NettletonTelevision

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LwVntD_hp2Q&ab_channel=NettletonTelevision

http://www.theshadowlands.net/places/arkansas.htm

Region 8 Haunts...Part Two

https://www.kait8.com/story/4053672/region-8-hauntspart-two/

Nettleton High School Gym/ Band room - Jonesboro ,Arkansas

https://hauntedplacesofusa.blogspot.com/2009/10/nettleton-high-school-gym-band-room.html

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
